title: On the Beauty of Yardangs
description: Some geological materials (like solid rock) are incredibly tough, but others (like piles of volcanic ash) are quite soft. Some materials are soft enough that they can be eroded by the wind alone and yield landscapes that look like what we see in this HiRISE image.
theme:
LIFELESS. Desert lands — if you value still
and silent beauty of the cosmos
